thread.title: TRAYNOR, ROBERT

author: TRAYNOR, ROBERT
title: TRAYNOR, ROBERT
text: This is the third coffee machine that we have purchased from Whole Latte Love. The first one did not last a long time and instead of a repair their advice was to obtain a Jura E8 which kept going for 12 years making thousands of cups of coffee. We are elated with our new the Gaggia Accademia...Like a true Italian, a bit more temperamental than the Jura, needs water a bit more often...but A the coffee is worth it! And what a cappuccino!
